text: Vladimir Suchánek (12 February 1933 – 25 January 2021) was a Czech graphic artist and postage stamp designer. He was born in Nové Město nad Metují, Czechoslovakia. He was President of the Hollar Society, the leading Czech graphic art organisation. He was the designer of several stamps for the Czech Republic. Suchánek died in Prague on 25 January 2021, aged 87.Ve věku 87 let zemřel grafik Vladimír Suchánek ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech artists
title: Vladimír Suchánek
